item.title: Oweh leads Kentucky rally past No. 22 St. John's
item.description: Otega Oweh scored 20 points to help Kentucky rally past No. 22 St. John's and former coach Rick Pitino on Saturday, 78-66.

item.title: Cowboys activate Diggs ahead of Chargers game
item.description: The Cowboys activated Trevon Diggs off injured reserve on Saturday, giving the two-time Pro Bowl cornerback the opportunity to play Sunday against the...

item.title: QB Becht leaving Cyclones for 'new opportunities'
item.description: Quarterback Rocco Becht, who has led Iowa State to 26 wins over the past three years, says he will "pursue new opportunities for my senior season."

item.title: Lakers' Smart fined $35K for gesture at official
item.description: Lakers guard Marcus Smart was fined $35,000 for making an obscene gesture toward a game official at halftime of L.A.'s win over the Jazz on Thursday.

item.title: Dillingham signs new 5-year deal with Sun Devils
item.description: Arizona State coach Kenny Dillingham has signed a new five-year contract that will average nearly $7.5 million over the course of the deal.
